subject: p19182863
Findings: A right IJ terminates at the superior cavoatrial junction. The heart is mildly enlarged. The hilar and mediastinal contours remain within normal limits. Mild central pulmonary vascular congestion and pulmonary edema is unchanged since. A small right pleural effusion has enlarged. There is no pneumothorax or a focal consolidation.
Impression: Enlargement of a small right pleural effusion since 4:48 am. Unchanged mild central pulmonary vascular congestion and interstitial edema.
